name: redraw
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change something, especially the borders between countries or regions: The state must redraw political boundaries to reflect new population numbers. Both groups are redrawing the balance of power across the country.
to draw something again, especially to improve it: The floor plan had to be redrawn.
